We stopped here for drinks and to bask in the glory that is Tickets. We couldn't get a reservation there since we didn't even book our trip two months in advance, but if it's anything like the cocktails and bar snacks at 41 degrees I will certainly plan another trip around it. Each drink involved various ingredients, techniques, and a little bit of booty shaking (which is welcome from the hottie bartenders). Do stop here if you get a chance!
